description: Created to be your favourite all-round trekking trousers in cold conditions, Abisko Winter Stretch Trousers are soft-shell winter trousers made of a double-weave, four-way stretch fabric with a brushed inside that makes them both warm and extremely comfortable. Fabric made from a recycled nylon, polyester and elastane blend with a PVC-free DWR Articulated knees and elasticated waistband add to their excellent freedom of movement and adjustable leg endings with cinches to keep snow out.<br><br> Zippered hand pockets and an additional zippered pocket in the side seam for valuables. Perfect for winter excursions where you need excellent freedom of movement combined with warmth, durability and protection from the elements.
name: Abisko Winter Stretch Trousers, Long - Womens
